entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Elliot Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:33 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Sunny. High minus 22.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. High minus 22. Wind chill minus 41 this morning and minus 32 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 30 with temperature rising to minus 18 by morning.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then periods of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 30 with temperature rising to minus 18 by morning. Wind chill minus 39 this evening. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning then light in the afternoon. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of snow. Low minus 9. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of snow. Low minus 9. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. High minus 2. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Cloudy. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Clearing. Low minus 12. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Sunny. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Sunny. High minus 4. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of snow. Low minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of snow. Low minus 3. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. High minus 1. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 8. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 1.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 1. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Snow. Low minus 3. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Snow. High plus 1. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023
